sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './index.css' class Board extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { butterQuatity:67, butterPrice:455, sugarCrates:44, sugarQuantity:400, isLoggedIn:true, oil:600, egg:100, } } incrementButter = () => { this.setState({ butterQuatity }) } render() { return (
The Quantity Of Butter

{this.state.butterQuatity}

The Price Of Butter

{this.state.butterPrice}

The Quantity Of Crates

{this.state.sugarCrates}

Flavor

{this.state.butterQuatity}

Oil

{this.state.butterPrice}

Eggs

{this.state.sugarCrates}

); } } export default Board;
